Docs.summary: Describes what kind of layout the adaptive user interface has on a particular dimension.

remarks.para: Starting with iOS 8, sizes for your user interfaces are made up of two size classes, one for width and one for height. The sizes are either compact or regular. For example, an iPhone typically has both compact widths and compacts heights.
